description:
This library module provides data conversion functions for processing calendar dates, temporal values, currency values, units of measurement, location names and postal addresses.

The logic contained in this module is not specific to any particular XQuery implementation.

functions.name: address-from-domain
functions.description: Uses a whois service to discover information about a given domain name, returning a sequence of strings for the addresses associated to the name.
functions.summary: Uses a whois service to discover information about a given domain name, returning a sequence of strings for the addresses associated to the name.

returns.description:
A sequence of strings for the addresses associated to the domain name.

Attention : This function is still not implemented.

functions.name: address-from-geocode
functions.signature: ($lat as xs:double, $lon as xs:double) as xs:string*
functions.description: Geospatial coordinates to placename converter, acting as a wrapper over the Yahoo! reverse geocoder service.
functions.summary: Geospatial coordinates to placename converter, acting as a wrapper over the Yahoo! reverse geocoder service.

returns.description: The sequence of strings corresponding to the different components (e.g., street, city, country, etc.) of the place name that corresponds to the input geospatial coordinates.

functions.name: address-from-phone
functions.description: Uses a White-pages Web service to discover information about a given phone number, returning a string for the address associated to the phone number.
functions.summary: Uses a White-pages Web service to discover information about a given phone number, returning a string for the address associated to the phone number.

parameters.name: phone-number
parameters.description: A string with 10 digits corresponding to the phone number.

returns.description: A string for the addresses associated to the phone number.

functions.name: address-from-user
functions.description: Uses a White-pages Web service to discover information about a given name, returning a sequence of strings for the addresses associated to the name.
functions.summary: Uses a White-pages Web service to discover information about a given name, returning a sequence of strings for the addresses associated to the name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of person or organization.

returns.description: A sequence of strings for the addresses associated to the name.

functions.name: currency-convert
functions.signature: ($v as xs:double, $m1 as xs:string, $m2 as xs:string, $date as xs:string) as xs:double
functions.description:
Currency conversion function, acting as a wrapper over the WebService from the European Central Bank.

WebService documentation at http://www.ecb.int/stats/exchange/eurofxref/html/index.en.html
functions.summary: Currency conversion function, acting as a wrapper over the WebService from the European Central Bank.

parameters.name: v
parameters.description: The amount we wish to convert.

returns.description: The value resulting from the conversion.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">conversion:NOTSUPPORTED if the date, the source currency type or the target currency type are not known to the service.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: geocode-from-address
functions.description: Placename to geospatial coordinates converter, acting as a wrapper over the Yahoo! geocoder service.
functions.summary: Placename to geospatial coordinates converter, acting as a wrapper over the Yahoo! geocoder service.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: A sequence of strings corresponding to the different components (e.g., street, city, country, etc.) of the place name.

returns.description: The pair of latitude and longitude coordinates associated with the input address.

functions.name: name-from-domain
functions.description: Uses a whois service to discover information about a given domain name, returning a sequence of strings for the person or organization names associated to the name.
functions.summary: Uses a whois service to discover information about a given domain name, returning a sequence of strings for the person or organization names associated to the name.

returns.description:
A sequence of strings for the person or organization names associated to the domain name.

Attention : This function is still not implemented.

functions.name: phone-from-address
functions.description: Uses a White-pages Web service to discover information about a given address, returning a sequence of strings for the phone number associated to the address.
functions.summary: Uses a White-pages Web service to discover information about a given address, returning a sequence of strings for the phone number associated to the address.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: A string corresponding to the address (ex: 5655 E Gaskill Rd, Willcox, AZ, US).

returns.description: A sequence of strings for the phone number or organization's names associated to the address.

functions.name: phone-from-domain
functions.description: Uses a whois service to discover information about a given domain name, returning a sequence of strings for the phone numbers associated to the name.
functions.summary: Uses a whois service to discover information about a given domain name, returning a sequence of strings for the phone numbers associated to the name.

returns.description:
A sequence of strings for the phone numbers associated to the domain name.

Attention : This function is still not implemented.

functions.name: phone-from-user
functions.description: Uses a White-pages Web service to discover information about a given name, returning a sequence of strings for the phone numbers associated to the name.
functions.summary: Uses a White-pages Web service to discover information about a given name, returning a sequence of strings for the phone numbers associated to the name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of person or organization.

returns.description: A sequence of strings for the phone numbers associated to the name.

functions.name: unit-convert
functions.signature: ($v as xs:double, $t as xs:string, $m1 as xs:string, $m2 as xs:string) as xs:double
functions.description: Conversion function for units of measurement, acting as a wrapper over the CuppaIT WebService.
functions.summary: Conversion function for units of measurement, acting as a wrapper over the CuppaIT WebService.

parameters.name: v
parameters.description: The amount we wish to convert.

parameters.name: m1
parameters.description: The source measurement unit metric (e.g., "meter")

parameters.name: m2
parameters.description: The target measurement unit metric (e.g., "mile")

returns.description: The value resulting from the conversion

functions.name: user-from-address
functions.description: Uses a White-pages Web service to discover information about a given address, returning a sequence of strings for the names associated to the address.
functions.summary: Uses a White-pages Web service to discover information about a given address, returning a sequence of strings for the names associated to the address.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: A string corresponding to the address (ex: 5655 E Gaskill Rd, Willcox, AZ, US).

returns.description: A sequence of strings for the person or organization's names associated to the address.

functions.name: user-from-phone
functions.description: Uses a White-pages Web service to discover information about a given phone number, returning a sequence of strings for the name associated to the phone number.
functions.summary: Uses a White-pages Web service to discover information about a given phone number, returning a sequence of strings for the name associated to the phone number.

parameters.name: phone-number
parameters.description: A string with 10 digits corresponding to the phone number.

returns.description: A sequence of strings for the person or organization's name associated to the phone number.

variables.name: conversion:key
variables.description: The key to be used when accessing the White Pages Web service
